typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empname as string,
		salary as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		deptno as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(deptid == deptno,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		empid,
		empname,
		salary,
		deptid,
		deptname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumns1
RemoveColumns1 split(equals(empid, '100'),
	notEquals(empid, '100'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(empid, notempid)
ConditionalSplit1@empid sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
